meta.name: Realistic Portrait
meta.description: Natural photography presets for everyday scenes

character.Classic Beauty: A woman with soft symmetrical features, natural facial proportions, calm human expression, subtle makeup, realistic skin texture
character.Girl Next Door: A woman with friendly approachable features, light freckles, warm smile, casual beauty, natural elegance
character.Athletic: A woman with strong facial structure, confident eyes, healthy complexion, athletic build, natural strength
character.Ethereal: A woman with delicate features, pale soft skin, dreamy expression, gentle presence, ethereal beauty
character.Mature Elegant: A woman with refined features, graceful aging, sophisticated presence, timeless beauty

scene.Apartment Evening: in a small apartment living room, during warm evening light
scene.Bedroom Night: in a cozy bedroom corner, during soft midnight glow
scene.Café Afternoon: in a dim café booth, during overcast afternoon
scene.City Street Night: on a rain-soaked city street, during neon-lit night
scene.Rooftop Sunset: on a rooftop terrace, during golden sunset hour

emotion.Contemplative: quietly reflective mood, sitting with legs loosely crossed, relaxed posture
emotion.Confident: softly confident, casual stance with weight on one hip, natural self-assured presence
emotion.Peaceful: tired but peaceful, lying comfortably, relaxed limbs, soft breathing

wardrobe.Casual Hoodie: wearing an oversized cotton hoodie, loose shorts, soft worn fabric
wardrobe.Silk Camisole: wearing a silk camisole with soft folds, fitted shorts, natural draping
wardrobe.Linen Blouse: wearing a light linen blouse, simple skirt, gentle movement

photography.Warm Lamp: soft lamp light from the side, diffused warm glow, calm atmosphere
photography.Golden Hour: afternoon window light, golden ambient glow, peaceful warmth
photography.Cool Night: diffused streetlight through window, cool blue tones, urban mood

technical.Portrait 50mm: shot on 50mm lens, eye-level perspective, shallow depth of field, professional photography
technical.Portrait 85mm: shot on 85mm lens, cinematic focus separation, soft bokeh background
technical.SDXL Quality: professional photography, sharp focus, photorealistic, high detail
technical.FLUX Natural: raw photo, photorealistic, detailed skin texture, professional camera, natural colors
